explains: adj. 截面的，断面的，剖面的
adj. 涉及一个断面的；具有代表性的，典型性的
wordGroup: cross-sectional area 横断面积；断面面积
cross-sectional data 横截面数据；横断面数据；剖面数据

sentences.en: Inversely proportional to the cross-sectional area of the rod.
sentences.cn: 棒子的横截面积，成反比。

sentences.en: That would give me a cross-sectional area of eight times ten to the minus five square meters.
sentences.cn: 那么横截面就等于,8乘以10的,负五次方平方米。

sentences.en: A community-based cross-sectional survey was undertaken in 10 subdistricts in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia’s capital.
sentences.cn: 我们在内蒙古首都乌兰巴托的10个小区进行了以社区为基础的横断面调查。
